channel.title: Old school same as runescape server
channel.description: i need help codeing a winderlove server i want to make it the same as old rs i want the skilling kinda the same but you get 10% more exp then in regular rs if i need someone who is a very good coder such like the reaper and other and you must have team view

item.title: Old school same as runescape server
item.dc:creator: @guitar9000 guitar9000
item.description:
@guitar9000 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:7, topic:263594”][quote author=guitar9000 link=topic=348140.msg2679067#msg2679067 date=1235259643]
It is not possible to code a source exactly like old runescape. it just isnt. if you want to learn to code i recomend looking at the guide section and not spamming here…

-Jonah
[/quote]

Anything is possible, if Jagex could do it, I am sure we could if we had a big enough development. I doubt it will happen, but it is definitely possible.[/quote]

not to get offtopic, but your right. im just saying that a leecher could not do it. and plus it would takes years to make

Read full topic
